paper_abstract: This letter presents a new extensible markup language (XML) router topology-disco very control plane algorithm for the creation of an overlay network of XML routers. The algorithm generates optimal topology based on priority-based metrics and parameters from the network, transport, and application layers. As application-level (XML) machines are of modest throughput, message processing must be distributed within a topology that attends to network, transport, and application layer metrics. Simulation results demonstrate that our algorithm delivers flexibility, scalability, and delay minimization while algorithm simplicity reduces processing requirements. (C) 2008 Alcatel-Lucent.
paper_title: Scalable XML Routed Network Topology Generation
